title: The Aristocats
creator_credit: Ralph Wright, Vance Gerry, Ken Anderson, Winston Hibler, Larry Clemmons, Julius Svendsen, Wolfgang Reitherman, Eric Cleworth, Frank Thomas, Walt Disney Animation Studios and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: When Madame Adelaide Bonfamille leaves her fortune to Duchess and her children—Bonfamille’s beloved family of cats—the butler plots to steal the money and kidnaps the legatees, leaving them out on a country road. All seems lost until the wily Thomas O’Malley Cat and his jazz-playing alley cats come to the aristocats’ rescue.

constellations_other.name: Raising the Roof: on-screen levity on rooftop
constellations_other.description: Performances soar to new heights on the rooftop, not only showcasing skylines but also creating electrifying drama, comedy and spectacle.

creator_credit_for_label: Ralph Wright, Vance Gerry, Ken Anderson, Winston Hibler, Larry Clemmons, Julius Svendsen, Wolfgang Reitherman, Eric Cleworth, Frank Thomas, Walt Disney Animation Studios and Walt Disney Pictures
